column5: Water canal view, fully furnished 2 bedroom 2 bath island refuge. Shower & deep soaking air bathtub. Fishing from dock, private and community patios. Full size WD, 2 TV's, cable & 1 DVD. Short distance to Beaches, Schlitterbahn, restaurants, nightlife, RX, shopping, putt putt golf & coffee shop. Time to relax and enjoy.
